thread.title: Carbon Nanotubes (CNTs) Market for Single Walled Nanotube (SWNT) and Multi Walled Nanotube (MWNT) Global Opportunities Analysis and Forecasts 2015 – 2025
thread.title_full: Carbon Nanotubes (CNTs) Market for Single Walled Nanotube (SWNT) and Multi Walled Nanotube (MWNT) Global Opportunities Analysis and Forecasts 2015 – 2025

title: Carbon Nanotubes (CNTs) Market for Single Walled Nanotube (SWNT) and Multi Walled Nanotube (MWNT) Global Opportunities Analysis and Forecasts 2015 – 2025
text:
By: ABNewswire - Press Release Distribution Service September 20, 2015 at 21:15 PM EDT Carbon Nanotubes (CNTs) Market for Single Walled Nanotube (SWNT) and Multi Walled Nanotube (MWNT) Global Opportunities Analysis and Forecasts 2015 – 2025 The Global Market for Carbon Nanotubes: Technologies, Production, End User Markets and Opportunities Analysis, 2015 – 2025 report provides carbon nanotubes market structure, carbon nanotubes patents, carbon nanotubes applications roadmap and analysis carbon nanotubes end user market segment analysis. 
According to The Global Market for Carbon Nanotubes: Technologies, Production, End User Markets and Opportunities Analysis, 2015 – 2025 report once the most promising of all nanomaterials, carbon nanotubes (CNTs) face stiff competition in conductive applications from graphene and other 2D materials and in mechanically enhanced composites from nanocellulose. However, after considerable research efforts, real CNT products are hitting the market, and large-scale industrial production of single-walled carbon nanotubes (SWNTs) has been initiated, promising new market opportunities in transparent conductive films, transistors, sensors and memory devices. Li-ion battery additives and super capacitors are also potential high growth market opportunities. 
The Global Market for Carbon Nanotubes: Technologies, Production, End User Markets and Opportunities Analysis, 2015-2025 report is 437 pages report available at: 
What Does The Report Include? Comprehensive quantitative data and forecasts for the global graphene market to 2025 Qualitative insight and perspective on the current market and future trends in end user markets based on interviews with key executives End user market analysis and technology timelines Financial estimates for the markets graphene will impact Patent analysis Tables and figures illustrating graphene market size Full company profiles of graphene producers and application developers including technology descriptions and end user markets targeted Profiles of prominent research centres Industry activity and breakthroughs by market 2013-2015 
Order a Licensed Copy of the Report at: 
Single User Price of the Report is US $1543.
